Verses: 1 aabiraam Thonnootronbadhu Vayadhaanapodhu, Karththar Aabiraamukku Dharisanamaagi: Naan Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan; Nee Enakku Munbaaga Nadandhukondu Uththamanaayiru.
2 naan Unakkum Enakkum Naduvaaga En Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththi, Unnai Migavum Thiralaaip Perugappannuven Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Aabiraam Mugankuppura Vizhundhu Vananginaan. Dhevan Avanode Pesi:
4 naan Unnode Pannugira En Udanpadikkai Ennavendraal, Nee Thiralaana Jaadhigalukkuth Thagappanaavaai.
5 ini Un Per Aabiraam Ennappadaamal, Naan Unnaith Thiralaana Jaadhigalukkuth Thagappanaaga Erpaduththinapadiyaal, Un Per Aabiragaam Ennappadum.
6 unnai Migavum Adhigamaaip Palugappanni, Unnile Jaadhigalai Undaakkuven; Unnidaththilirundhu Raajaakkal Thondruvaargal.

7 unakkum Unakkup Pinvarum Un Sandhadhikkum Naan Dhevanaayirukkumpadi Enakkum Unakkum, Unakkuppin Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Varum Un Sandhadhikkum Naduve, En Udanpadikkaiyai Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Sthaabippen.
8 nee Paradhesiyaaith Thangivarugira Kaanaan Dhesamuzhuvadhaiyum, Unakkum Unakkup Pinvarum Un Sandhadhikkum Niththiya Sudhandharamaagak Koduththu, Naan Avargalukkuth Dhevanaayiruppen Endraar.
9 pinnum Dhevan Aabiragaamai Nokki: Ippozhudhu Neeyum, Unakkup Pin Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Varum Un Sandhadhiyum, En Udanpadikkaiyaik Kaikkollungal.

10 enakkum Ungalukkum, Unakkup Pinvarum Un Sandhadhikkum Naduve Undaagiradhum, Neengal Kaikkolla Vendiyadhumaana En Udanpadikkai Ennavendraal, Ungalukkul Pirakkum Sagala Aanpillaigalum Viruththasedhanampannappadavendum;
11 ungal Nuniththolin Maamsaththai Viruththasedhanampannakkadaveergal; Adhu Enakkum Ungalukkumulla Udanpadikkaikku Adaiyaalamaayirukkum.

12 ungalil Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagap Pirakkum Aanpillaigalellaam Ettaam Naalile Viruththasedhanampannappadavendum; Veettile Pirandha Pillaiyum Un Viththallaadha Anniyanidaththil Panaththirkuk Kollappatta Endhap Pillaiyum, Appadiye Viruththasedhanampannappadavendum.

13 un Veettile Pirandha Pillaiyum, Un Panaththirkuk Kollappattavanum, Viruththasedhanampannappadavendiyadhu Avasiyam; Ippadi En Udanpadikkai Ungal Maamsaththile Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Irukkakkadavadhu.

14 nuniththolin Maamsam Viruththasedhanampannappadaadhirukkira Nuniththolulla Aanpillaiyirundhaal, Andha Aaththumaa En Udanpadikkaiyai Meerinapadiyaal, Than Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupovaan Endraar.
15 pinnum Dhevan Aabiragaamai Nokki: Un Manaivi Saaraayai Ini Saaraai Endru Azhaiyaadhiruppaayaaga; Saaraal Enbadhu Avalukkup Peraayirukkum.
16 naan Avalai Aaseervadhiththu, Avalaale Unakku Oru Kumaaranaiyum Tharuven; Aval Jaadhigalukkuth Thaayaagavum, Avalaale Jaadhigalin Raajaakkal Undaagavum, Avalai Aaseervadhippen Endraar.
17 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Mugankuppura Vizhundhu Nagaiththu: Nooruvayadhaanavanukkup Pillai Pirakkumo? Thonnooru Vayadhaana Saaraal Pillai Peruvaalo? Endru Than Irudhayaththile Sollikkondu,
18 ismavel Umakku Munbaagap Pizhaippaanaaga! Endru Aabiragaam Dhevanidaththil Vinnappampanninaan.

19 appozhudhu Dhevan: Un Manaiviyaagiya Saaraal Nichchayamaai Unakku Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaal, Avanukku Eesaakku Endru Periduvaayaaga; En Udanpadikkaiyai Avanukkum Avanukkup Pinvarum Avan Sandhadhikkum Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Sthaabippen.

20 ismavelukkaagavum Nee Seydha Vinnappaththaik Ketten; Naan Avanai Aaseervadhiththu, Avanai Migavum Adhigamaagap Palugavum Perugavum Pannuven; Avan Pannirandu Prabukkalaip Peruvaan; Avanaip Periya Jaadhiyaakkuven.
21 varugira Varushaththil Kuriththakaalaththile Saaraal Unakkup Perappogira Eesaakkode Naan En Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththuven Endraar.
22 dhevan Aabiragaamode Pesi Mudindha Pinbu, Avar Avanaivittu Ezhundharulinaar.

23 appozhudhu Aabiragaam Than Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelaiyum, Than Veettile Pirandha Yaavaraiyum, Thaan Panaththirkuk Konda Anaivarumaagiya Than Veettilulla Aanpillaigal Ellaaraiyum Serththu, Dhevan Thanakku Sonnapadi, Avargal Nuniththolin Maamsaththai Annaaliledhaane Viruththasedhanampanninaan.
24 aabiragaamudaiya Nuniththolin Maamsam Viruththasedhanampannappadumpodhu, Avan Thonnootronbadhu Vayadhaayirundhaan.
25 avanudaiya Kumaaran Ismaveludaiya Nuniththolin Maamsam Viruththasedhanampannappadumpodhu, Avan Padhinmoondru Vayadhaayirundhaan.
26 orenaalil Aabiragaamum Avan Kumaaran Ismavelum Viruththasedhanampannappattaargal.
27 veettile Pirandhavargalum Anniyaridaththile Panaththirkuk Kollappattavargalumaagiya Avan Veettu Manushargal Ellaarum Avanodekooda Viruththasedhanampannappattaargal.
